p: Till date, most studies have reported the presence of HEV3 in liver transplants. Direct molecular testing of liver tissue has also detected HEV-RNA in 1% of the biopsies of the patients [ 112]. A study in the Netherlands reported the rate of HEV in liver transplant recipients to be 1%. In 2012, a study reported that of 300 liver transplant recipients tested, only one developed chronic HEV infection [ 99].
